title: geth can't see ~/.ethereum/chaindata
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `Geth/v1.5.0-unstable/linux/go1.5.1n`
OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
Commit hash : (if `develop`)
#### Expected behaviour

I0703 20:20:23.960851 core/blockchain.go:204] Last header: #{latestBlock} [d4e56740…] TD=17179869184
I0703 20:20:23.960976 core/blockchain.go:205] Last block: : #{latestBlock}  [d4e56740…] TD=17179869184
I0703 20:20:23.961022 core/blockchain.go:206] Fast block: : #{latestBlock}  [d4e56740…] TD=17179869184
#### Actual behaviour

https://gyazo.com/a59e0c3fe6996dda9e9a8fbf6ef2c850
I0703 20:20:23.960851 core/blockchain.go:204] Last header: #0 [d4e56740…] TD=17179869184
I0703 20:20:23.960976 core/blockchain.go:205] Last block: #0 [d4e56740…] TD=17179869184
I0703 20:20:23.961022 core/blockchain.go:206] Fast block: #0 [d4e56740…] TD=17179869184
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

$ geth console
#### Backtrace

```
~/.ethereum$ ls -la
total 292
drwxr-xr-x 5 ubuntu ubuntu   4096 Jul  3 20:23 .
drwxr-xr-x 6 ubuntu ubuntu   4096 Jul  3 20:10 ..
drwxr-xr-x 2 ubuntu ubuntu 270336 Jul  3 20:22 chaindata
drwxr-xr-x 2 ubuntu ubuntu   4096 Jul  3 20:22 dapp
-rw------- 1 ubuntu ubuntu   7901 Jul  3 20:23 history
-rw------- 1 ubuntu ubuntu     64 Jun 25 08:51 nodekey
drwxr-xr-x 2 ubuntu ubuntu   4096 Jul  3 20:22 nodes
ubuntu@ip-172-31-9-175:~/.ethereum$ cd ..
ubuntu@ip-172-31-9-175:~$ geth console 
I0703 20:23:11.991115 ethdb/database.go:82] Alloted 128MB cache and 1024 file handles to /home/ubuntu/.ethereum/chaindata
I0703 20:23:12.099045 ethdb/database.go:169] closed db:/home/ubuntu/.ethereum/chaindata
I0703 20:23:12.099175 cmd/utils/flags.go:605] WARNING: No etherbase set and no accounts found as default
I0703 20:23:12.099473 ethdb/database.go:82] Alloted 128MB cache and 1024 file handles to /home/ubuntu/.ethereum/chaindata
I0703 20:23:12.189581 ethdb/database.go:82] Alloted 16MB cache and 16 file handles to /home/ubuntu/.ethereum/dapp
I0703 20:23:12.191345 eth/backend.go:171] Protocol Versions: [63 62 61], Network Id: 1
I0703 20:23:12.191463 eth/backend.go:200] Blockchain DB Version: 3
I0703 20:23:12.192452 core/blockchain.go:204] Last header: #0 [d4e56740…] TD=17179869184
I0703 20:23:12.192526 core/blockchain.go:205] Last block: #0 [d4e56740…] TD=17179869184
I0703 20:23:12.192573 core/blockchain.go:206] Fast block: #0 [d4e56740…] TD=17179869184
I0703 20:23:12.198212 p2p/server.go:313] Starting Server
I0703 20:23:14.102377 p2p/discover/udp.go:217] Listening, enode://ce2d4ae73ab7ebaecdbe9c62897ddb5a94032cd0df3c58d4fd0af4be8061cef50063bbdaa1286f30a1d1831e1cfdf0148c762b7c320a1a0509954573b21dba72@[::]:30303
I0703 20:23:14.132207 p2p/server.go:556] Listening on [::]:30303
I0703 20:23:14.132530 node/node.go:296] IPC endpoint opened: /home/ubuntu/.ethereum/geth.ipc
Welcome to the Geth JavaScript console!

instance: Geth/v1.5.0-unstable/linux/go1.5.1
 modules: admin:1.0 debug:1.0 eth:1.0 miner:1.0 net:1.0 personal:1.0 rpc:1.0 txpool:1.0 web3:1.0

// also when checking at javascript console 
$ eth
then
https://gyazo.com/aa0aaca8de06f6abcf8b6e0499c4c1d5
0703 20:24:08.944498 core/blockchain.go:972] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 771 ignored) including 0 txs in 1.684959069s. #8068 [8c3fb33f / e0e3ebec]
I0703 20:24:09.336613 core/blockchain.go:972] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 189 ignored) including 0 txs in 390.228231ms. #8257 [d7073370 / 11784c3e]
I0703 20:24:10.521862 core/blockchain.go:972] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 582 ignored) including 0 txs in 1.17978418s. #8839 [00c128bd / 66dd0972]
I0703 20:24:10.896826 core/blockchain.go:972] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 185 ignored) including 0 txs in 373.05899ms. #9024 [2b0fd45c / 8fa319fb]
I0703 20:24:10.910796 core/blockchain.go:972] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 7 ignored) including 0 txs in 13.738401ms. #9031 [410b4ae3 / d94bc6c2]
I0703 20:24:12.398893 core/blockchain.go:972] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 761 ignored) including 0 txs in 1.456518694s. #9792 [24f582e6 / e5e55fc2]
I0703 20:24:12.779704 core/blockchain.go:972] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 192 ignored) including 0 txs in 379.01874ms. #9984 [8f821ad7 / 20c28f4c]
I0703 20:24:12.889183 core/blockchain.go:972] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 3 ignored) including 0 txs in 9.706793ms. #9987 [41063a2e / ec4a457b]
I0703 20:24:14.710487 core/blockchain.go:972] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 765 ignored) including 0 txs in 1.562804076s. #10752 [d10a52d1 / 7a10064c]
I0703 20:24:15.915716 core/blockchain.go:972] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 576 ignored) including 0 txs in 1.2002949s. #11328 [e695fc67 / 45049d58]
I0703 20:24:16.311855 core/blockchain.go:972] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 192 ignored) including 0 txs in 394.319959ms. #11520 [35aff715 / 12395e26]
I0703 20:24:16.315747 core/blockchain.go:972] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 2 ignored) including 0 txs in 3.712838ms. #11522 [c86e155b / 4bc6095b]
ethI0703 20:24:17.500132 core/blockchain.go:972] imported 0 block(s) (0 queued 574 ignored) including 0 txs in 1.17676856s. #12096 [ad833715 / 2f09b74c]

{
  accounts: [],
  blockNumber: 0,
  coinbase: undefined,
  compile: {
    lll: function(),
    serpent: function(),
    solidity: function()
  },
  defaultAccount: undefined,
  defaultBlock: "latest",
  gasPrice: 21772520000,
  hashrate: 0,
  mining: false,
  pendingTransactions: [],
  syncing: {
    currentBlock: 0,
    highestBlock: 1819064,
    knownStates: 0,
    pulledStates: 0,
    startingBlock: 0
  },


```

The database format changes from Geth 1.4.x to Geth 1.5.x, to accommodate spinning drive machines which were extremely slow due to the previous random access schema. When upgrading to 1.5, it should pick up and convert old 1.4.x databases, but if you run an 1.4.x after that, it will not be able to handle the upgraded database and just think it's empty, messing it up entirely.

Here was the heads up warning: https://twitter.com/jeffehh/status/742365388374200324

Please either stick to 1.4.x branch for now, or move over to 1.5 (develop) and stick to that. Don't mix the two as they will just cause trouble.
